name: Coconut Carrots
description: Our Coconut Carrots recipe is a perfect blend of simplicity and flavor, designed to suit a healthy lifestyle. Ideal for those on low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diets, this dish brings out the natural sweetness of carrots, enhanced by a hint of coconut. Dive into a plate of these healthy and delicious carrots to boost your daily vegetable intake in the most delightful way!

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the carrots and slice them into uniform pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a pot, bring water to a boil and blanch the carrot pieces for about 3 minutes to soften them slightly.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the carrot pieces and set them aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan over medium heat, lightly toast the teaspoon of coconut until golden brown, about 1 minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the blanched carrot pieces to the pan and toss with the toasted coconut, cook for an additional 5 minutes to infuse the flavors.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
